name: Marie&Phill Travel612vlog
review: beautiful beach has white sand  clean and well maintain love it  but there s a lot of jellyfish

name: The Adventurer
review: first opened in 1976  sokcho beach is one of korea s most popular beaches  it is located a short walking distance from sokcho express bus terminal  making it popular among tourists  the waters here are clean and shallow  adding to the popularity of this beach during the summer season  there are also many restaurants and convenience facilities located near the beach  as well as a small park with walking trails through a pine forest  along the beach  visitors can find interesting and unique photo spots and sculptures  busking performances and festivals also take place throughout the year

name: Udo Wagener
review: great beach with a beautiful view of a every small island   frequent fireworks on weekends  not sure about weekdays   safe area  and you are allowed to pitch a tent on the beach and camp  for free       surrounded by many coffee shops and restaurants  public showers and toilets in the parking area  in the event that you want to camp

name: Kyuwon Lee
review: a beautiful  serene beach located not far from the sokcho downtown area  the seaside path leads to the brand new resort nearby  there are coffee shops and dessert places that are worth checking out along the beach  too

name: Nippon Fraser
review: nice but a little crowded for my taste  water wasn t particularly bad but not very clear blue  parking around wasn t too bad like other beaches i ve been to in korea

name: Md. Imrul Reza Shishir
review: sokcho beach   is really a nice pleasant beach  the transportation around the beaches is really regular and comfortable  the washroom near beachside is really clean and has water facilities  there are many family fun activities around the beaches  you will like the korean food specially street food like squid grill  crab  shrimp fry  me and my family had pleasant experience

name: ?됮쉮??Alexis
review: a great tourist spot  good photography spot for instagramming   beautiful   clean beach with toilets   changing rooms facilities   it s just less than 10 mins walk from sokcho express bus terminal   passed lots of fresh seafood restaurants on our way   food stalls from evening to late night at the parking lot  if you have time  take a stroll along the beach using the path

name: Mev A-M
review: i am caribbean  so very few beaches impress me  the water is not blue but it was iced cold   the sand was like sandpaper   wear sandals   there are a few areas that are picture worth  plenty of street food  and available parking   we visited during the week days  i liked that it wasn t trashed

name: Camila
review: beautiful beach with a wide line of sand  the water is so clear and has a good temperature even thought swimming is not allowed  october 2019   recommended

name: Lejesz
review: jesus christ loves you all please praise god jesus is king of kings jesus is lord of lords blessed are those who love god before anyone may god bless you  your family  friends and our enemies may god bless our enemies may god be with you  your family  friends and may god be with our enemies  amen

name: Clax B
review: awesome beach to walk along  not sure if they allow swimming during the summer but it was a no go in october  the waves were amazing to watch while longing in a beach swing

name: Candido Cruz
review: lovely water  the sand was clean  the people were kind  as a first time guest to sokcho beach i heavily suggest this place to couples  families  or singles young and old  this place was magnificent

name: Rendy Bahri
review: i cant say this beach is so beautiful but i think for local tourists this beach is quite famous  it will be very crowded when summer holiday come  if you have time just come here and relax here

name: Cecilia Torres Quiroz
review: clean and pretty beach  the sand is not the fine  so when you walk on it  it is relaxing

name: Zohid Mamadjanov
review: my favorite beach in korea  sokcho beach  which is donghae  east sea  is one of the cleanest beaches of korea  it is around 10 minutes walk from sokcho bus terminal  swimming period is officially open between early july to late august  there are some coffee shops near the beach which offers amazing sea view from their terraces

name: Shimul TheBoss
review: i have never forgotten this tour  i have spends late night and sunrise   i love this place

name: Shreya Maity
review: very nice place    enjoyed a lot   great weekend

name: Wajuddin Ahmad
review: wonderful sea bech in korea  views are very nice  i spend more then one hour here  enjoyed very much  i wanna go again

review: cheap parking and 10 000 parasols socal distant apart  beautiful ocean with tube rentals  clean beach  people come around with a box of chicken

name: jaja na
review: it s beautiful and peaceful

name: Kausik Bishayee
review: a better place to enjoy the holiday

name: Elizabeth Cook
review: sokcho beach was a really pleasant  medium sized beach with some nice paths and good food nearby  lots of public restrooms   note that as with many korean beaches there is no swimming here   a sign indicates that you should not swim  although we did not see any lifeguards or people to reinforce this  and people generally just wade  the waves were fairly intense

name: Timothy Jung Sik Yun
review: we went after the beach facilities had closed for the season  but there were still plenty of people enjoying the beach   normally they operate showers  changing rooms and lifeguards during the summer seasons   the sand is a little on the coarse side and the waves are smaller   we found plenty of places to park  but this may be due to it being  off season   during the summer season i hear that the parking isn t free so check before you go

name: Nick Osborn
review: beach was packed with people  like sardines in a can  lifeguards would not allow anyone into the water  steep drop off and big waves  it is a miserable excuse for a beach  if you want to enjoy getting into the water  go north to a small town beach  it is 100x better

name: Matthew Skidmore
review: nice beach  good amenities  mostly for families

name: Chetan Kaur
review: amazing place  a must visit

name: Leong Sang Yu
review: excellent view  breezing  peaceful and clean

name: THO TRAN
review: nice place in korea to enjoy sandy beach  dont forget to try squid sundae  which is local specialty

name: Seung-won Lee
review: one of the nice and well developed sand beach on the east sea coastal line of korea  good for night walk with well equiped lighting system along the beach

name: Sagor Das
review: we actually went for trekking in seoraksan but we couldn t rode on the top pick because of some seasonal warning reasons there and instead we trekked mt ulsan and saved a lot of time there  searched for the nearby sea beach and we came here  won t say we weren t surprised a bit  the view is really good and very tranquil environment   not very crowded is the best part maybe beacause it is april but still a place to step on if you have enough time

name: Kirill Kile
review: i wouldn t advise to go there  don t waste your time and money watching the drunk faces  prices are just insane everywhere and the swimming area is so small  there are no lockers and showers provided and  to my mind  the safeguard and beach stuff supervise too much  awful

name: Kanchan Popli
review: good place for camping

name: Simon White
review: nice but not worth a visit specifically to see it  heavy machinery were levelling out part of the beach there  the walk into the sea is very steep and the water is quite choppy

name: Genis Artiaga
review: everyone talks very well about this place  to be honest it s just a regular beach in a absolutely not beautiful city  in my experience if i had to decide to go or not from seoul  i definitely would skip this one  if you want to visit the area then better go to seoraksan

name: Michelle La Velle
review: a beautiful place to visit  however  there needs to be a better trash pickup and i would suggest having  clean up your trash  or you will be fined  kind of signs around to encourage people to pick up their trash

name: Abdullah Al Marouf
review: one of the most popular and famous beaches in gangwon do state  tourists from different countries  states  cities  ages  stages come to the beach during summer time  the beach is very attractive and secure enough for tourists  there are many lodging options available near to the beach  the famous lotte resort and ramada resort are located in there  the area is very clean and well organized  there are many restaurant and coffee shops available here  sokcho express bus terminal is very close to the beach  if you re in sokcho i recommend you to visit here

name: MyLobsterJin
review: amazing calming place  seawater is soo clean

name: John van Bockxmeer
review: this is a nice beach with good proximity to transport  bus  taxi rank  and plenty of hotels  resorts and motels in the surrounding streets  there is a beachside promenade with sheltered bathrooms and changing facilities for men and women  the water is quite cold but not too rough and wavey  the sand is a dark white colour and coarse compared to beaches in countries like thailand and australia  overall a relaxing experience and good for korea but not up to the same standard as tropical countries  go here after you ve experienced seoraksan national park if you have time

name: Abdul Khadar
review: very nice and clear water low tides with clean beach area night time with full of lights coastal gaurds are keep monitoring the crowd at the beach nice place to even stay at night

name: Lia Bradbery
review: we went last year in early august  the sea was clean and transparent  despite the steep waves  we got caught in a little rain  but it ended quickly  for children  there are pools on the beach  because you can t swim in the sea with a small child  for the little ones  there was such a paddling pool  there are deeper ones  and very large in width  but you can t go there with adults  be sure to take a martas or an inflatable ring with you  because  you can t swim in the sea calmly there  most people do just that  and just ride the waves  i lowered the star  because i didn t manage to swim with the child  and in the end  only my feet were wetted in the paddling pool

name: Sara Fernandez
review: the beach is like any other beach  except that there is hardly any room to swim because there are buoys just 5m from the shore   there are more beautiful beaches on the way here from busan     la playa es como cualquier otra playa  lo que pasa que apenas hay sitio donde nadar porque hay boyas a apenas 5m de la orilla   hay playas m s bonitas de camino a aqu  desde busan

name: 龜逵???戟逵 鬼??逵剋??克逵?
review: the beach is just amazing  a rather large pine forest adjoins it  therefore  the air here is completely healing  in the evening  the lights of fishing schooners shine on the horizon  which daily go out for night fishing  shrimp  crabs and other animals  almost on the beach there is a small museum of local lore  few tourists come here  but in vain  it presents natural stones of extraordinary beauty  which in korea are collectibles
